request.description: Get all applications made by the authenticated tutor.

formdata.description: User's email address must be unique
Min 10 characters, valid phone number format

request.description: Create a new user account.
Authenticate a user and get access token.

item.name: Store new qualification for authenticated tutor
Get all connection requests for the authenticated user

request.description:
Returns connection requests either sent or received by the user,
depending on whether they are a learner or tutor.

body.raw: {"tutor_id":3,"message":"I would like help with advanced calculus topics.","learner_whatsapp":"+1234567890","period_type":"weekly"}

request.description:
Creates a new connection request from a learner to a tutor.
Only authenticated learners can create connection requests.

variable.description: The ID of the connection request.

request.description:
Marks a connection request as paid, simulating payment completion.
Only the learner who created the request can mark it as paid.

variable.description: The ID of the connection request.

request.description:
Allows a tutor to accept a connection request that has been paid for.
Sets the connection start and end dates and updates status to accepted.

variable.description: The ID of the connection request.

request.description:
Allows a tutor to reject a connection request.
Only the tutor who received the request can reject it.

query.description:
Specify which relationships to include in the response.
            Multiple relationships can be comma-separated.
            Available relationships: learner, category, applications
Search in gig title and description
Filter gigs by the learner who created them

request.description:
Get a list of all available learning gigs. By default, only open gigs are returned.
For authenticated users, their own gigs of all statuses are included.
Get detailed information about a specific gig.

Create a new gig in pending status (Learner only). The gig will not be visible to others
until it is published.

body.raw: {"category_id":1,"title":"iusto","description":"Excepturi voluptates nobis tempore praesentium laboriosam consequatur reiciendis in.","budget_period":"minima","budget":"consequatur","location":"dignissimos","status":"vel"}

request.description: Update an existing gig (Gig owner only).
Delete a gig (Gig owner only).
Change a gig's status from pending to open, making it publicly available (Gig owner only).
Change a gig's status from open to pending, making it private (Gig owner only).
